DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the influence of remote magnetic catheter navigation on the safety and efficacy of mapping and radiofrequency ablation of the cavotricuspid isthmus in patients with typical atrial flutter.
DOC.brief_title: Remote Magnetic Navigation For Cavotricuspid Isthmus Ablation
DOC.criteria: ECG documentation of at least 1 episode of typical atrial flutter Prior right atrial ablation Ferromagnetic implants that may interfere with the magnetic navigation system Pregnancy
